Instruction: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and grease a baking sheet.
Coat potatoes with vegetable oil, Parmesan cheese, curry powder, paprika, salt, and garlic powder in a resealable plastic bag. Spread the seasoned potatoes evenly on the greased baking sheet.
Bake until potatoes are soft and tender, approximately 20 minutes.
